oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Catalytic transfer hydrogenation of nitro and carbonyl compounds over novel Fe(III) substituted hexagonal mesoporous aluminophosphates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SONAVANE, SU
MOHAPATRA, SK
JAYARAM, RV
SELVAM, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: chemoselective transfer hydrogenation
oxide hydroxide catalyst
hydrazine hydrate
reduction
propan-2-ol
aldehydes
ketones
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Catalytic transfer hydrogenation (CTH) of aromatic nitro and carbonyl compounds over novel Fe(III) substituted hexagonal mesoporous aluminophosphate (FeHMA) molecular sieve catalyst showed excellent regioselectivity/chemoselectivity as well as superior recycling capability. Furthermore, the reduction occurs without affecting other functional groups such as -CN, -CHO, -Cl, -CH3, -OCH3 and -NH2.
